verbs.description: [ARG0: pittsburgh police] [V: responding] [ARG1: to report of suspicious package at jewish food bank] [ARGM-TMP: for the second time in a week] pittsburgh police responded to a report of a suspicious package at the jewish faith and community services food pantry in greenfield pittsburgh jewish food pantry
